reviewText:
If you want a clear understanding of Primitive bow making. Watch it or buy the book! You will know all the secrets to get it right. If your looking to make bows for show. you will need to apply the knowledge and perfect it. If your looking to make a primitive bow for survival just watch it.
Mike W...
Very, very, dry, boring non professional video.  Sort of like your neighbor shot it in the 70s.  Very disappointing video.
This DVD exceeded my expectations. It goes into extreme detail about this subject. I will be buying ALL the videos by John and Geri McPherson/Prariewolf. Buy this, you won't be dissappointed.
